content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a business owner. I used to be a computer programmer, but I got tired of the corporate world. I wanted to be my own boss.
That's great! I am a paper salesman. I deliver packages for a living. It's not too bad, but I'm not passionate about it.
I love football. I would love to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
That's a great idea! I would love to see that happen.
I'm glad you like it! I'm working on a prototype right now.
That's amazing! I'm sure it will be a success.
I love D&D. It's so much fun to role play and create your own character.
Me too! I love getting lost in a fantasy world.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone who shares my passions.
Me too! We should play D&D sometime.
That would be so much fun!
